body_html:
Could reproduce @isalirezag error with latest binary. Worked after building from source (on osx) using:

conda create -n pytorchsource python=2.7 
source activate pytorchsource
conda install numpy pyyaml setuptools cmake cffi   

git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch
git submodule update --init        
MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install

cd ...

python 
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch import autograd

input = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(3, 3))

m = nn.ConstantPad2d((1,1,1,1), 0)
output = m(input)
print(output)

Variable containing:
 0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000
 0.0000  0.5107  2.0236 -1.2180  0.0000
 0.0000  0.8027 -0.2484  1.7507  0.0000
 0.0000  0.0755  0.2109 -0.9640  0.0000
 0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000
[torch.FloatTensor of size 5x5]

Could reproduce @isalirezag  error with latest binary. Worked after building from source (on osx) using:
conda create -n pytorchsource python=2.7 
source activate pytorchsource
conda install numpy pyyaml setuptools cmake cffi   

git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch
git submodule update --init        
MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install

cd ...

python 
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch import autograd

input = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(3, 3))

m = nn.ConstantPad2d((1,1,1,1), 0)
output = m(input)
print(output)

Variable containing:

[torch.FloatTensor of size 5x5]
body:
Could reproduce @isalirezag  error with latest binary. Worked after building from source (on osx) using:
```
conda create -n pytorchsource python=2.7 
source activate pytorchsource
conda install numpy pyyaml setuptools cmake cffi   

git clone https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git
cd pytorch
git submodule update --init        
MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install

cd ...

python 
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.nn.functional as F
from torch.autograd import Variable
from torch import autograd

input = autograd.Variable(torch.randn(3, 3))

m = nn.ConstantPad2d((1,1,1,1), 0)
output = m(input)
print(output)

Variable containing:
 0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000
 0.0000  0.5107  2.0236 -1.2180  0.0000
 0.0000  0.8027 -0.2484  1.7507  0.0000
 0.0000  0.0755  0.2109 -0.9640  0.0000
 0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000  0.0000
[torch.FloatTensor of size 5x5]
```
